name: Dungeon on the East side of the Map
name_original: Dungeon on the East side of the Map
description:
//Made with the help of YaySushi

/*****Controls*****/

WASD / arrow keys to move

space to shoot

ctrl to dash (if you can)

c to switch to lazer (if you have)

get to the pumpkin and see how long you can survive :)

/*****background music*****/

Z23 Sama-ru - Xenoblade Chronicles X OST
